title: Robert Scott Detlof
text: Robert Scott Detlof (born 6 May 1961) is a Brazilian <a href="Alpine%20skiing">alpine skier</a>. He competed in the <a href="Alpine%20skiing%20at%20the%201992%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20slalom">men's slalom</a> at the <a href="1992%20Winter%20Olympics">1992 Winter Olympics</a>.
